    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21276486">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276486">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276486">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           United States Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21276486">
          <p>
           This is a list of selected multi-purpose resources.&nbsp; For additional recommendations by topic, see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Finding Statistics and Data: Topical Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21276486" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24783714">
              <a id="link_24783714" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783714}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783716">
              <a id="link_24783716" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783716,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783716}); ">
               FedStats
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to official statistical information produced by the U.S. federal government.  Browse by topic or agency or search across agency websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783718">
              <a id="link_24783718" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://hsus.cambridge.org/HSUSWeb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783718,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783718}); ">
               Historical Statistics of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics from colonial times to modern day covering population, work and welfare, economic structure and performance, economic sectors, and governance and international relations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783715">
              <a id="link_24783715" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783715,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783715}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783721">
              <a id="link_24783721" href="http://lehighvalleyresearch.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783721,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783721}); ">
               Lehigh Valley Research Consortium
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Quantitative and qualitative data on the Lehigh Valley on: demographics, public opinion, economic indicators, non-profit sector, governmental sector, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783720">
              <a id="link_24783720" href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783720,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783720}); ">
               Pennsylvania State Data Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783717">
              <a id="link_24783717" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783717,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783719">
              <a id="link_24783719" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783719,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783719}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and comprehensive summary of statistics on the social, political, and economic organization of the United States.  Current and archived editions (1995- ) are available online, as well.   Old print editions (1886- ) are in the Trexler Library Government Documents section starting at C 3.134:886.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276487">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276487">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276487">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           International Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21276487">
          <p>
           This is a list of selected multi-purpose resources.&nbsp; For additional recommendations by topic, see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Finding Statistics and Data: Topical Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21276487" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24783729">
              <b>
               International Historical Statistics, 1750-2000
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 310 M681i v.1-3 (Level B)
               <br />
               Key economic and social indicators for 1750-2000.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783727">
              <a id="link_24783727" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783727,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783727}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information, including statistics, on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for hundreds of world entities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783726">
              <a id="link_24783726" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783726,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783726}); ">
               Europa World Year Book
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief statistics by country on a variety of topics, including: area and population, health and welfare, agriculture, industry, trade, transport, education, and more.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783730">
              <a id="link_24783730" href="http://hdr.undp.org/en" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783730,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783730}); ">
               Human Development Reports (United Nations Development Programme)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783725">
              <a id="link_24783725" href="http://www.census.gov/aboutus/stat_int.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783725,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783725}); ">
               International Statistical Agencies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to international statistical agencies.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783724">
              <a id="link_24783724" href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783724,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783724}); ">
               OFFSTATS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to free official, international statistics resources by country, region, and subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783723">
              <a id="link_24783723" href="http://data.un.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783723,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783723}); ">
               U.N. Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search across the United Nation's statistical databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783728">
              <a id="link_24783728" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/syb/default.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783728,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783728}); ">
               United Nations Statistical Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Annual compilation of a wide range of international economic, social and environmental statistics on over 200 countries and areas, compiled from sources including UN agencies and other international, national and specialized organizations."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783722">
              <a id="link_24783722" href="http://data.worldbank.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783722,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783722}); ">
               World Bank Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics for countries around the world on a wide variety of topics, including education-related topics.  From the World Bank.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276488">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276488">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276488">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Public Opinion Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21276488">
          <div id="boxatt21276488" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24783731">
              <a id="link_24783731" href="http://www.electionstudies.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783731,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783731}); ">
               American National Election Studies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Produces high quality data on voting, public opinion, and political participation."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783732">
              <a id="link_24783732" href="http://www.gallup.com/home.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783732,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783732}); ">
               Gallup
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Presents daily briefings on a single current topic, as well as recent Gallup Poll findings.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783733">
              <a id="link_24783733" href="http://www.pollingreport.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783733,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783733}); ">
               Polling Report
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Biweekly overview of recent poll trends.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783734">
              <a id="link_24783734" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/direct.asp?db=ufh&amp;jid=POQ&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783734,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24783734}); ">
               Public Opinion Quarterly -- "The Polls"
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Regular feature of preeminent scholarly journal on public opinion and polling, discusses recent surveys.  Browse through each issue to access "The Polls" or search across the journal by topic to check for features on your topic.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276504">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276504">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276504">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Agriculture and Food
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009725">
          <div id="boxatt14009725" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776449">
              <a id="link_16776449" href="http://www.nass.usda.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776449,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776449}); ">
               National Agricultural Statistics Service
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics on "virtually every aspect of U.S. agriculture, [including]: production and supplies of food and fiber, prices paid and received by farmers, farm labor and wages, farm finances, chemical use, changes in the demographics of U.S. producers," and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776450">
              <a id="link_16776450" href="http://www.fao.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776450,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776450}); ">
               Food and Agriculture Organization (United Nations)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Agricultural, food, and food safety statistics by region, country, and world.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276508">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276508">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276508">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Environment
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009729">
          <div id="boxatt14009729" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776458">
              <a id="link_16776458" href="http://earthtrends.wri.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776458,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776458}); ">
               World Resources Institute: EarthTrends
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Comprehensive online database, maintained by the World Resources Institute, that focuses on the environmental, social, and economic trends that shape our world."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276511">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276511">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276511">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Health
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009730">
          <div id="boxatt14009730" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776459">
              <a id="link_16776459" href="http://www.cdc.gov/datastatistics/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776459,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776459}); ">
               Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers a wide variety of health topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25163171">
              <a id="link_25163171" href="http://www.statistics.health.pa.gov/Pages/default.aspx#.VrJojFLELCt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25163171,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25163171}); ">
               Pennsylvania Health Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776460">
              <a id="link_16776460" href="http://www.who.int/en/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776460,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776460}); ">
               World Health Organization (WHO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               International data on mortality, diseases, services, health systems, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21276513">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21276513">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21276513">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Population and Demographics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009731">
          <div id="boxatt14009731" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776461">
              <a id="link_16776461" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776461,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808343}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776462">
              <a id="link_16776462" href="http://www.census.gov/prod/www/abs/decennial/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776462,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776462}); ">
               Census of Population and Housing
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Decennial censuses from the U.S. Census Bureau from 1790 to the present are available online. Print copies of the decennial census from 1880 on are available in Trexler Library's Government Documents starting at C3:223.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776463">
              <a id="link_16776463" href="http://www.census.gov/ipc/www/idb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776463,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776463}); ">
               International Data Base (U.S. Census Bureau)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Basic demographic information by country and region.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776464">
              <a id="link_16776464" href="http://www.census.gov/aboutus/stat_int.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776464,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808362}); ">
               International Statistical Agencies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to international statistical agencies.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
